title: Pilot
description: After breaking up with her two-timing beau, schoolteacher Jess Day moves in with three single males: a bartender, a womanizer and a personal trainer.

title: Kryptonite
description: Nick and Schmidt help Jess get her things out of her ex's apartment. Later, Jess meets new roomie Winston, who's back from playing basketball abroad.

title: Wedding
description: Fearful that he'll run into his ex-girlfriend at a wedding, Nick asks Jess to be his date. Meanwhile, Winston takes his role as an usher seriously.

title: Naked
description: Jess accidentally walks in on Nick naked, sending his self-confidence to an all-time low -- just after a pretty co-worker agrees to go out with him.

title: Cece Crashes
description: Cece convinces Jess that Nick wants to be more than friends with her, and Schmidt tries to seal the deal with Cece.

title: Thanksgiving
description: Things go horribly awry when Jess invites a music teacher -- whom she's always has had a crush on -- to the gang's Thanksgiving dinner at the loft.

title: Bells
description: Jess becomes jealous when Winston joins her handbell quartet and instantly steals the limelight with his natural ability.

title: Bad in Bed
description: When Jess decides to take her relationship with Paul to the next level, she asks the guys for sex advice.

title: The 23rd
description: The gang attends Schmidt's holiday office party, and Jess frets when she receives an expensive gift from Paul.

title: The Story of the 50
description: Jess steps in when Schmidt's plans for his birthday party fall apart. Meanwhile, Nick begins dating a pretty lawyer who's hiding a secret.

title: Jess and Julia
description: Nick panics when Julia doesn't want to put a label on their relationship. Meanwhile, Julia consents to help Jess get out of a traffic ticket.

title: The Landlord
description: Against Nick's wishes, Jess makes it her mission to get the loft's crabby landlord to like her, inadvertently jeopardizing their living situation.

title: Valentine's Day
description: Jess persuades Schmidt to be her wingman as she sets out to have a casual fling with a handsome stranger on Valentine's Day.

title: Bully
description: Jess finds herself the target of a classroom bully. Meanwhile, Nick goes into a tailspin when Julia sends him a cactus.

title: Injured
description: When Nick gets hurt playing touch football and Jess discovers he doesn't have insurance, she takes him to her doctor friend -- who's a gynecologist.

title: Control
description: After realizing that Schmidt is doing all the housework, Jess pushes him to go on strike -- and the loft's entire ecosystem gets thrown off balance.

title: Fancyman, Part 1
description: Jess reluctantly dates the wealthy father of one of her students. Meanwhile, Schmidt and Winston become ultracompetitive while playing bar trivia.

title: Fancyman, Part 2
description: Jess's date with Russell doesn't go as planned. Meanwhile, Nick's college friend visits and brings out Nick's inner frat boy.

title: Secrets
description: Cece has been keeping a secret from Jess, which creates a rift between them when Jess finds out. Meanwhile, Nick has trouble juggling two women.

title: Normal
description: A nervous Jess invites Russell to spend the weekend at the loft, and her fears mount when he gets along better with the guys than she'd hoped.

title: Kids
description: Jess babysits Russell's preteen daughter for the weekend and meets his ex-wife. Meanwhile, a pregnancy scare sends Schmidt and Cece into panic mode.

title: Tomatoes
description: Unwilling to admit her true feelings for Schmidt, Cece encourages him to go on a date with one of her beautiful roommates.

title: Backslide
description: The gang fears that Jess and Nick may backslide into romantic relationships when they bump into their exes.

title: See Ya
description: One of the roommates decides to move out of the loft. Meanwhile, Winston faces his fear of the dark when the gang makes a trip to the desert.

title: Re-Launch
description: Schmidt throws a "rebranding" party, where the newly unemployed Jess volunteers to be a shot girl alongside a jaded cocktail waitress.

title: Katie
description: Mistaken identity abounds as Jess unwittingly captures the attention of a beer delivery guy and then pretends to be a handsome stranger's blind date.

title: Fluffer
description: Nick and Jess address their relationship-without-benefits, and Schmidt hopes to date a cute Republican by pretending to be one of Mitt Romney's sons.

title: Neighbors
description: When a group of young neighbors moves in across the hall, Jess and Schmidt are determined to become friends with them.

title: Models
description: Jess and Cece have a huge fight about their life choices. Meanwhile, Schmidt and Nick argue over the rules of male friendship.

title: Halloween
description: Jess gets hired as a zombie at a haunted house. Meanwhile, Schmidt's and Cece's Halloween costumes match -- but Winston's and Shelby's don't.

title: Menzies
description: Jess's search for a new job gets intense. Meanwhile, her time of the month affects the guys, and Schmidt starts a relationship with his boss.

title: Parents
description: Jess enlists help for a "Parent Trap" scheme when her divorced parents visit for Thanksgiving. Meanwhile, Schmidt deals with his own family drama.

title: Eggs
description: Jess frets about her biological clock when a friend gets pregnant, while Nick and Winston seek inspiration at the zoo for Nick's zombie-themed novel.

title: Bathtub
description: Jess and Winston want to get a bathtub for the loft. Meanwhile, Schmidt must decide between his boss and Cece.

title: Santa
description: While attending multiple holiday parties in one night, Jess tries to avoid Sam, and Nick tries to keep up with his adventurous date.

title: Cabin
description: Things go awry when Nick and Angie spend a weekend away with Jess and Sam. Meanwhile, Winston teaches Schmidt about race relations.

title: A Father's Love
description: Jess tries to help Nick repair his relationship with his con-man father, but Nick worries that his dad is only using him in a scheme.

title: Pepperwood
description: Nick suspects that one of Jess's night-school students is hiding something. Meanwhile, Winston and Cece have an embarrassing encounter.

title: Cooler
description: During a guys' night out, Nick and Schmidt are attracted to the same woman. Meanwhile, Winston falls for a girl who doesn't return his affections.

title: Table 34
description: Cece hopes to find a husband at a dating convention for East Indians, while Jess and Nick find themselves in a compromising position in front of Sam.

title: Parking Spot
description: Schmidt finds a prime parking spot, which the roommates then fight over. Meanwhile, Winston looks for a condom after getting an invitation from Daisy.

title: Tinfinity
description: Winston interviews a football player who's interested in Jess. Elsewhere, Nick and Schmidt plan a party to celebrate 10 years of being roommates.

title: Quick Hardening Caulk
description: After admitting how she feels about Nick, Jess learns that he may be hiding something. Elsewhere, Schmidt becomes preoccupied with buying a fish.

title: Chicago
description: After a death occurs in Nick's family, the gang travels with him to Chicago, where his friends help with funeral plans and meet his eccentric family.

title: First Date
description: Jess and Nick attempt to break out of relationship limbo by going on a date, but their romantic outing is sabotaged by Schmidt and Winston.

title: Bachelorette Party
description: While Jess throws a surprise bachelorette party for Cece, Nick and Winston take her fianc√© out for a guys' night.

title: Virgins
description: In a series of flashbacks, the gang shares stories about how each one lost his or her virginity.

title: Winston's Birthday
description: Jess's dad visits at a bad time, forcing Nick to spend time alone with him. Meanwhile, Winston hopes someone will throw him a surprise birthday party.

title: Elaine's Big Day
description: Jess and Nick make a decision about their relationship. Meanwhile, Schmidt and Winston plan to sabotage Cece's wedding.

title: All In
description: Nick and Jess flee to a Mexican beach to officially take the romantic plunge, but Nick finds himself on the wrong side of the law.

title: Nerd
description: Jess makes the mistake of asking Nick for advice when she tries to make friends with a band of unfriendly teachers at her new school.

title: Double Date
description: Schmidt is mistakenly invited on a double date with Jess and Nick, and there's a hitch in Winston's promise to get them a table at a hot new eatery.

title: The Captain
description: Schmidt tries to sabotage Jess and Nick's relationship, and Winston gives his cat, Furguson, a night on the town before being neutered.

title: The Box
description: Jess secretly uses Nick's recent inheritance to pay his long-overdue bills, and Schmidt turns to a rabbi for help with life's big questions.

title: Keaton
description: Jess hosts a Halloween party, and the gang tries to cheer up Schmidt by posing online as his childhood hero, actor Michael Keaton.

title: Coach
description: Single once again, Coach moves back into the loft, where things have changed. Meanwhile, Jess and Cece meet an intriguing guy on a girls' night out.

title: Menus
description: Bummed that she can't take her class to the beach, Jess takes out her anger on the Chinese restaurant whose menus are drowning the loft.

title: Longest Night Ever
description: Jess tries to distract Schmidt while Coach and Cece enjoy their first date; a bus driver sidetracks Nick and Winston as they search for Furguson.

title: Thanksgiving III
description: The group gets a lesson in roughing it when Jess and Nick decide they should celebrate Thanksgiving in the wilderness.

title: Clavado En Un Bar
description: When Jess is given 20 minutes to decide whether to take a new job and give up teaching, the gang reflects on their own career choices.

title: Basketsball
description: Nick grows jealous when Jess and Coach bond over his basketball team's arch rivals, while Schmidt mentors a new employee and Winston starts a new job.

title: Birthday
description: Nick tries to plan the perfect birthday party for Jess. Meanwhile, Schmidt works overtime to help Cece, who's just started a new bartending job.

title: Prince
description: Jess and Cece are thrilled to be invited to a party at the home of music legend Prince, but of course the guys plan to crash the bash.

title: Exes
description: Jessica teaches Nick how to be friends with his ex, and Coach borrows Schmidt's loft for a date that gets cut short ... by Schmidt and his own date.

title: Sister
description: A visit from Jess's wild-child sister Abby brings disaster. Meanwhile, Nick serves as wingman when Schmidt crashes a bar mitzvah.

title: Sister II
description: A visit was one thing; now Jess's wild sister Abby plans to stay in L.A. Meanwhile, Winston waits too long to check his police academy test results.

title: Sister III
description: When Abby moves in with Schmidt, Jess decides to move into Nick's bedroom, which doesn't work out well for either of them.

title: Fired Up
description: Jess hires Coach as a new volleyball coach; Schmidt asks Nick and Winston to represent him at a deposition when he gets sued.

title: Mars Landing
description: Jess and Nick examine their relationship, Cece drunk-texts Buster, and Schmidt, Winston and Coach try to impress their attractive new neighbors.

title: Big News
description: Jess and Nick struggle to keep news of their breakup from their friends, and Winston demands a party in honor of his acing the police academy exam.

title: Dance
description: Jess thinks that somebody is trying to short-circuit her first dance as a middle school teacher, so she asks the gang to serve as chaperones.

title: Cruise
description: Jess and Nick invite everyone on a cruise that they had scheduled when they were still together, but Coach has a little problem with boats.

title: The Last Wedding
description: When the gang attends a wedding and each of them sets out to get lucky, Jess eyes the best man while Schmidt tries to talk Nick into a foursome.

title: Dice
description: Schmidt helps Jess use a dating app. Nick, Cece and Coach are high on marijuana brownies when Winston invites them to a party with other LAPD cadets.

title: Julie Berkman's Older Sister
description: Jess is shocked to learn her dad's new girlfriend is her old high school classmate and rival. The guys participate in Schmidt's product focus group.

title: Micro
description: Jess tries to prove she's not shallow by dating a guy with a male endowment issue. Cece and Winston suggest to Coach and Schmidt they could be models.

title: Landline
description: Just when Jess cracks down on dating among school staff, she gets the hots for a new teacher. The gang has a new home phone, and Nick plays secretary.

title: Background Check
description: Winston's police academy processing includes a background check and home search, so Jess's possession of an illegal substance just might be an issue.

title: Goldmine
description: Jess's new boyfriend seems threatened by Nick, so Nick pretends he's gay. Schmidt is dismayed when Cece contemplates breast reduction surgery.

title: Teachers
description: Jess is anxious about attending a weekend teachers' workshop with Ryan and Coach. Nick, Schmidt and Winston plan their idea of a wild guys' weekend.

title: Thanksgiving IV
description: With everyone single at Thanksgiving, Schmidt introduces "Bangsgiving," for which each person is to bring a friend to sleep over with another friend.

title: Girl Fight
description: An old argument resurfaces between Jess and Cece, and Schmidt's caught in the middle. Winston is suspicious of Nick's date, Tran's granddaughter Kai.

title: LAXmas
description: Stuck at the airport due to flight delays, the gang worries they'll end up home alone for the holidays. Jess, however, receives a special invitation.

title: Shark
description: Jess urges Schmidt to use his political links to halt the night construction on their street. Nick and Coach are concerned about Winston's partner.

title: Coming Out
description: Jess goes out of her way not to give Ryan preferential treatment now that the staff knows they're dating. Winston's obsessed with a good luck crystal.

title: Swuit
description: Nick and Schmidt collaborate on a business idea -- a suit made of sweatshirt material -- but need Jess's help in presenting it to an investor.

title: The Crawl
description: The gang's Valentine's Day pub crawl finds Nick dumped by Kai, Ryan asking Jess to move in with him, and Schmidt reconnecting emotionally with Cece.

title: Oregon
description: Jess revisits her past when she and the gang attend a wedding in her Oregon hometown. Ryan is a no-show for the trip, and Cece runs into an old crush.

title: Spiderhunt
description: Schmidt's fear of spiders forces everyone in the loft to hunt down an eight-legged visitor. Coach tries to compose an email asking May out on a date.

title: Walk of Shame
description: Jess and Cece party all night, and Jess ends up spending the night with Bearclaw. Coach is embarrassed to introduce Nick and Winston to May.

title: The Right Thing
description: Jess attends the memorial of a guy she barely knew, Schmidt tries to get his bar mitzvah money from his mother, and Winston wants to befriend Aly.

title: Par 5
description: Jess tries to get new computers for the school by schmoozing with politicians at a charity event. Winston falls for an activist who dislikes police.

title: Panty Gate
description: Jess tries to doctor Coach and May's relationship as they hit a monumental hurdle. Schmidt agrees to take the blame for Fawn's political mishap.

title: Clean Break
description: Hoping for a fresh start, Schmidt discards mementos of Cece, while Jess and Nick reevaluate their relationship and Coach decides to move in with May.

title: Big Mama P
description: Jess and Nick plan an elaborate engagement party for Cece and Schmidt, but one part of the plan goes awry. Winston tires of being seen as a hero.

title: What About Fred
description: Jess tries dating again and ends up with a guy whose fun-loving parents she likes more than him. Nick and Schmidt become official owners of the bar.

title: Jury Duty
description: Jess is happy to be summoned for jury duty until a work opportunity comes up. Schmidt is caught in the middle between a bickering Nick and Cece.

title: No Girl
description: While Jess remains sequestered during jury duty, Nick rents out the loft to help pay for Schmidt's upcoming bachelor party in Tokyo.

title: Bob & Carol & Nick & Schmidt
description: Nick is forced to think about his future when his cousin visits to ask him for a life-changing favor. Winston helps Cece shop for a wedding dress.

title: Reagan
description: Nick rents out Jess's room to an attractive pharmaceutical sales rep named Reagan, but it seems the bisexual Reagan has some history with Cece.

title: Wig
description: Nick's attraction to Reagan impedes Schmidt and Cece's romance, so they try to demystify her, while Winston tutors Reagan in the art of breaking up.

title: The Decision
description: Reagan stirs up trouble when she tells Nick and Winston she'll sleep with one of them, but they must choose. Schmidt is reunited with a college bully.

title: Heat Wave
description: Nick's refusal to enjoy the air conditioning in Reagan's room during a heat wave leads to a confession. Winston discovers the uses of his "cop voice."

title: Goosebumps Walkaway
description: Back from jury duty, Jess tries to uncover a fellow juror's identity. Reagan prepares to leave town. Schmidt tries to conquer his fear of dancing.

title: The Apartment
description: Her new principal overloads Jess with work just as she's trying to help Cece move into the apartment and Cece's having second thoughts about marriage.

title: D-Day
description: Jess agrees to help a stressed Schmidt with the wedding. Cece gets an exciting new job offer. Winston and Nick argue over whose job is harder.

title: Sam, Again
description: Applying for a job at a more relaxed, progressive school, Jess discovers the principal is dating her ex-boyfriend. Schmidt quarantines Nick and Cece.

title: 300 Feet
description: Jess is dismayed when she is served a restraining order by former boyfriend Sam. A fancy new bar across the street competes with The Griffin.

title: Jeff Day
description: To help her buy a car from a sexist salesman, Jess invents a male alter ego. Schmidt and Cece don't want Winston's new girlfriend at their wedding.

title: Helmet
description: On the eve of meeting Sam's parents, Jess has an upsetting erotic dream about someone else. Aly's boyfriend competes with Winston at a cat audition.

title: Road Trip
description: Unsure of his masculinity after failing to protect Cece from a hostile driver, Schmidt takes the boys on a manly bachelors' road trip to Las Vegas.

title: A Chill Day In
description: Jess and Cece stay at home and relax while the guys attend the bachelor party, but events transpire to get them out of the apartment and partying.

title: Dress
description: Jess procrastinates on the alterations to Cece's dress. Schmidt turns a bathroom at work into a wedding workshop. Nick invites Reagan to the wedding.

title: Return to Sender
description: Jess meets an old friend of Sam's, Gavin's behavior makes Nick worried for Schmidt, and Winston's offended when a birthday gift seems unappreciated.

title: Wedding Eve
description: On the night before Schmidt and Cece's wedding, Nick and Winston help Schmidt rewrite his vows and Jess discovers an engagement ring in Sam's pocket.

title: Landing Gear
description: On the day of the wedding, Schmidt ends up stuck on a plane. Jess realizes her true feelings for Nick, who pursues a relationship with Reagan.

title: House Hunt
description: A flustered Jess strives to get her mind off Nick, Schmidt and Cece search for a home together, and Winston and Aly try things long distance.

title: Hubbedy Bubby
description: Jess and Cece set out to recruit voters for the presidential election, but Schmidt has his doubts. Winston schools Nick on modern phone sex.

title: Single and Sufficient
description: When Schmidt, Cece, Winston and Aly invite Jess on their glamping trip, she brings along some single friends. Nick hits a wall with his novel.

title: Homecoming
description: The gang heads to New York, where Schmidt believes his old school is honoring him. Jess crosses paths with officers from Brooklyn's 99th Precinct.

title: Jaipur Aviv
description: Schmidt and Cece get to work on their fixer-upper. Jess and Nick campaign to let Reagan move back into the loft. Winston makes a kinky discovery.

title: Ready
description: Jess announces she's ready to start dating again, Cece takes on a new role at the bar, and Winston learns that confidence is king.

title: Last Thanksgiving
description: Schmidt's dad is in town to celebrate Thanksgiving, but despite Jess's best efforts, the feast and festivities don't go according to plan.

title: James Wonder
description: Jess discovers that she could become her school's next principal. Nick tries to come up with the perfect wedding gift for Schmidt and Cece.

title: Es Good
description: While Jess and Robby wrestle with the idea of exclusivity, Schmidt asks Nick to help him deal with his difficult house contractor.

title: Christmas Eve Eve
description: Winston worries that his Secret Santa gift for Cece won't arrive in time, and the gang goes all out to ensure Jess has a memorable Christmas.

title: Raisin's Back
description: Nick orders everyone to play it cool and not make a big deal of Reagan's move-in day. Meanwhile, Schmidt's musical taste is called into question.

title: The Cubicle
description: Jess insists on paying Robby's medical bill. Cece's new modeling agency hits a snag. Reagan puts off reading Nick's novel.

title: Cece's Boys
description: Jess and Reagan help Cece recruit more models, and Schmidt searches for a way to forge a forever bond with Nick and Winston.

title: The Hike
description: While hiking, Jess and Robby make a surprising discovery about each other. Winston throws a welcome-home party for Aly at Schmidt and Cece's house.

title: Glue
description: Nick's anxiety goes into overdrive when Reagan lands him a book reading. Winston asks Schmidt and Cece for a big favor.

title: Operation: Bobcat
description: Jess insists that she's fine with being single on Valentine's Day. Schmidt goes after a promotion at work. Winston speeds up his plans.

title: Rumspringa
description: Nick and Schmidt take Jess on a trip to Solvang before she starts her new job. Cece helps Winston with a romantic entanglement.

title: Young Adult
description: Jess frets that now that she's principal, she doesn't have a connection with her students. Schmidt hires a new assistant.

title: Socalyalcon VI
description: While Schmidt and Cece stress out about security for their new home, Jess worries that she may be getting too close to Nick.

title: Misery
description: Jess tries to avoid thinking about Nick while hanging with her dad. Aly prepares to meet Winston's mom. Nick worries he doesn't really know Reagan.

title: San Diego
description: Jess and her dad bond over their romantic hardships. Nick asks Aly for relationship advice. Schmidt considers using his first name.

title: Five Stars for Beezus
description: As Jess prepares to reveal her feelings to Nick, Cece and Schmidt get life-changing news. Meanwhile, Aly helps Winston find an important person.

title: About Three Years Later
description: Jess and Nick return from a European book tour, Schmidt and Cece prepare for a birthday, and Winston and Aly fret over a photo.

title: Tuesday Meeting
description: After some encouragement from Cece, Jess demands more responsibility at her job. Also, Nick searches for book ideas and Schmidt needs sleep.

title: Lillypads
description: Schmidt and Cece ask Jess to help Ruth dazzle during a preschool interview. Nick falls victim to procrastination. Winston faces a judicial fear.

title: Where the Road Goes
description: The gang honors a dear and departed friend. Jess gets to the bottom of Nick and Coach's dispute. Schmidt ponders what Cece would do if he died.

title: Godparents
description: Jess gets a new title: godparent. Meanwhile, Winston is anxious about fatherhood and Schmidt returns to the office, where life's moved on without him.

title: Mario
description: New glasses allow Winston to finally see color. Schmidt and Cece schedule some sexy time. Nick's surprise proposal hits a snag.

title: The Curse of the Pirate Bride
description: Jess and Nick ignore pre-wedding tradition and pay the price for their hubris. Meanwhile, Aly's bun may be ready to leave the oven.

title: Engram Pattersky
description: When Jess and Nick get an eviction notice, they invite Schmidt, Cece and Winston over for one last jaunt down memory lane.
